availability.p: All research and writing of Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition annotations was undertaken by project staff, volunteers, and interns. Each record contains citations to relevant primary and secondary source material. All annotations are copyright Kentucky Historical Society, and should be referenced as such in any published work.

seriesStmt.title: Civil War Governors of Kentucky Digital Documentary Edition

body.p: Henderson County and Webster County, Kentucky, farmer. Kentucky native. Son of Madison Crowley and Elizabeth Crowley. Married to Mary Ann Grayson Crowley in Henderson County, Kentucky, in 1857. Father of Elizabeth A. Crowley. Farmer in Henderson County in 1850. Farmer in Webster County in 1860.

ab.bibl:
Seventh Manuscript Census of the United States (1850), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Henderson County, District 2, p. 331A.
Eighth Manuscript Census of the United States (1860), Population Schedules, Kentucky, Webster County, p. 503.
Kentucky Marriage Records, Madison County Courthouse, Richmond, Kentucky, Henderson County Marriages, Film #001944390, p. 265.
